column4: BRIEF-Microsoft announces new updates to protect against Spectre and Meltdown
column5: * MICROSOFT SAYS UPDATE ON SPECTRE AND MELTDOWN SECURITY UPDATES FOR WINDOWS DEVICES

column4: Broadcom return to the U.S. could be complete in mid-May: sources
column5: WASHINGTON Singapore-based chipmaker Broadcom Ltd  which is seeking to buy rival Qualcomm Inc  plans to complete its move back to the United States by mid-May  according to  sources familiar with the matter.
